sentences.sContent: Accordingly, the literature in English that has come down to us from this period (1150-1250) is almost exclusively religious or admonitory.
sentences.sContent_eng: Accordingly, the literature in English that has come down to us from this period (1150-1250) is almost exclusively religious or admonitory.
sentences.sCn: 因此，从这一时期（1150—1250）流传下来给我们的用英语写的作品几乎单一地是关于宗教或劝告的。
